@notice Initiate an atomicswap.
nodes.name: initiate

nodes.documentation: @notice Redeems the atomic swap using the secret.
nodes.name: redeem

nodes.documentation:
@notice Refunds the locked up funds to the current swap initiator, 
      after the expiry period.

nodes.documentation: @notice Withdraws ether/erc20 tokens from the arc contract.

nodes.documentation: @notice Pays fee to the Reward Vault Contract.

nodes.documentation: @notice validates the deposit.
nodes.name: validateDeposit

nodes.documentation: @notice Calculates fee, for a given value and fee rate.
